had no legal claim to it. The SCA, which Zahi Hawass heads, said in an email that its request had been approved by both Prime Minister Ahmed Nazif and the Egyptian ministry of culture. This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artefacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti bust... his handling of recent privacy concerns. " Eric Schmidt used to claim that Google put its money where its values were," said Comsumer Watchdog Inside Google director John M. Simpson . In fact while Eric Schmidt had his hand on the helm, values were changed to go where the money was. News of the changes overshadowed an otherwise solid financial report for Google.
